comments:
Got following error when attaching file in Bugzilla view. Attaching worked in Browser view.

Appears to be related to bug#157375

It looks like this is not reproducible anymore because the BugzillaAttachmentHandler no longer has any initializer code.  If you are still seing attachment failures with 0.9.1 or the dev build that we will cut tonight please reopen with the new stack trace.
